title: 461: Craig Conant is a Broad Forever!
itunes:title: 461: Craig Conant is a Broad Forever!
description:
Today The Broads are joined by the #broadsquad’s favorite comedian, Craig Conant, for his finale episode with them *trying not to cry* - but only tons of laughs here as they discuss (per usual) the most random sh*t AND answer some questions! We love you forever, Craig!

 

CRAIG CONANT:

***Follow Craig on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/craigpconant/ 

***See him on tour: https://www.craigconant.com/shows/ 

***Buy his merch: https://craigconantstore.com/ 

***Listen to his podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/community-service-with-craig-conant/id1441475405 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***KIWICO: Get your first month of ANY crate line FREE at KIWICO.COM/CHATTYBROADS 

***FIRSTLEAF WINE CLUB: Get your first 6 bottles for $39.95 plus free shipping at TRYFIRSTLEAF.COM/CHATTY 

***MATCH: Download the Match app today

***STAMPS: Get a 4-week trial, plus free postage and a free digital scale at STAMPS.COM  with code CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
